attributes.action: Invade Zimbabwe and restore Rhodesia as a part of the Commonwealth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to invade Zimbabwe (Rhodesia) Hang Mugabe and restore Rhodesia as a free member of the Commonwealth as envisioned by and in honour of the memory of Ian Smith.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
